nucleic acid extraction.name: Extract Name
nucleic acid extraction.description: User-defined names for each portion of extracted material.

library construction.name: Parameter Value[library source]
library construction.description: The LIBRARY_SOURCE specifies the type of source material that is being sequenced. (SRA 1.2 documentation)

library construction.name: Parameter Value[library strategy]
library construction.description: Sequencing technique intended for this library (SRA 1.2 documentation)

library construction.name: Parameter Value[library selection]
library construction.description: Whether any method was used to select for or against, enrich, or screen the material being sequenced. (SRA 1.2 documentation)

library construction.name: Parameter Value[library layout]
library construction.description: specifies whether to expect single, paired, or other configuration of reads.

nucleic acid sequencing.name: Parameter Value[sequencing instrument]
nucleic acid sequencing.description: a parameter to report the sequencing instrument model and make

nucleic acid sequencing.name: Comment[Export]
nucleic acid sequencing.description: Use this field to select/set which records should be exported for a submission to SRA/ENA

sequence assembly.name: Normalization Name
sequence assembly.description: User-defined name for each normalization applied

sequence assembly.name: Derived Data File
sequence assembly.description: derived data such as an assembly file
